Author: filsid
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba: A New Way To Learn About & Earn Cryptocurrencies https://sacrypto.co.za/artis-turba-a-new-way-to-learn-about-earn-cryptocurrencies/  Artis Turba, an intuitive cryptocurrency exchange based in South Africa, has launched its own token, called ARTIS, on the Ethereum blockchain. ARTIS, like Bitcoin and Ethereum, can be traded on cryptocurrency exchanges and provides specific utility. This utility is known as the Artis Affiliate Reward Program, or AARP for short, which entitles ARTIS holders to a pro-rata share of 50% of the trading fee revenue generated on Artis Turba. To enable AARP, all you need to do is own and hold ARTIS in your Artis Turba account. The earnings are automatically credited to your account daily based on the last 24-hours‚Äô trading volume.

Author: Lifestudent38
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba | Newsletter Jul 01, 2019  Welcome to the Artis Turba monthly newsletter where we want to keep you updated with the latest news and developments at Artis Turba. We know newsletters tend to build up in inboxes so we are aiming to keep it short and factual.  Platform News    We have some exciting functionality upgrades underway that will be released during the month of July. We present the instant trade function that will make the trading of Cryptocurrencies as easy as possible to our community. Additionally we are looking forward to the addition of Binance Coin on the platform and BNB coin will go live for trading on the 15th of July.  The Past Month Market Sentiments    The bullish sentiment in the overall market saw Bitcoin reach R200,000 ($12,500) toward the end of June before drawing back to current levels at R170,000 ($12,000). Do you think Bitcoin will breach this 2019 High? Share your insights on our twitter poll.  ARTIS and AARP (Artis Affiliate Rewards Program)    Artis Turba‚Äôs native token ARTIS allows holders to share in trading fee revenues generated on the exchange on a daily basis. Since the 17th of September 2018 ARTIS holders have been sharing in revenue generated on the Artis Turba Exchange. To participate in AARP, all you need to do is buy and hold ARTIS in your Artis Turba account. The earnings are automatically credited to your account daily based on the last 24-Hour's trading volume and in each currency.  Promotions    During July and August we are giving away 3x the BTT airdrop amount on the 11th of each month. All you need to qualify is atleast 1 TRX. Stay tuned on our social media as we announce more promotions in the upcoming month.  Feedback is awesome  Artis Turba is community driven and we love hearing from you! If you have any feedback, suggestions or just want to say hi, please visit any of the social media platform as at the bottom of this email and make your voice heard.  Happy Trading  Nigel & Nickey

Body: Trade ARTIS on TokenJar    You can now trade ARTIS on TokenJar, a decentralized exchange with zero service fees and direct transaction from wallet to wallet, without the need for deposit, registration and KYC. The underlying technology of TokenJar is the 0x Protocol, an open and permissionless protocol allowing for ERC20 tokens to be traded on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: Lifestudent38
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba News Update 30 July 2018  Dear ARTIS community We thank you all for your continued patience and support as we build the exchange that will drive ARTIS in the future. There is pressure from our community and our investors and we are fortunate to have received support from our ARTIS family.  Development is progressing steadily and the expected launch date for BETA exchange is now set for mid-September. We are delaying the launch of the exchange as it features a complex system including AARP that has to be tested thoroughly to ensure intended functionality. We have now successfully addressed concerns regarding security and provision for future expansion, thus we can now move forward.   There were negotiations and we have secured funding from our institutional investors for the provision of liquidity as liquidity is a major part of a successful exchange. From a management perspective ‚Äì all systems are ready to go. We are excited and anticipate with great enthusiasm the launch of the exchange.     Please trade responsibly, Forward Together!  Nigel & Nickey

Author: Lifestudent38
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba Public Announcement 16 August 2018  Dear ARTIS community  As you all are aware, the launch of the exchange was delayed by three and a half months to mid-September 2018. We had to make some hard decisions that affected long-term sustainability of the exchange in terms of security and scalability, we believe this will pay off in the long run.  Moving forward we are really excited to announce the launch of the Artis Turba Exchange Public Beta on the 17th of September 2018. We will focus to continually develop and improve the exchange experience for our users once the exchange goes live. This includes the addition of a list of cryptocurrencies, with special focus of top volume Cryptocurrencies and these will include a set of trading pairs including pairs with XRP!  For those in the community that make use of the current Artis Turba wallets on www.artisturba.com please ensure that you back-up your files/private keys, and in case you did not save their back-up info; send any remaining funds out of those wallets as the Exchange deployment will impact on the old architecture and make the current website as is redundant. This will take effect to the end of August.  We will soon move into our new corporate offices situated in the Central Business District in Centurion, South Africa and will also open up key positions to be filled. Currently the office based positions is for Brand Manager, Content Creators and Traders for Market Making activities. The remote based positions are for Content Creators and Community Liaisons. If you have the necessary qualification, experience and would like to join an AWSOME Team in a trending relaxed work environment send us email at business@artisturba.com and tell us more about yourself.  We now look forward to the exchange launch with great enthusiasm and growing the Artis Turba community.  Please trade responsibly, Forward Together!  Nigel & Nickey

Author: Lifestudent38
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba Public Announcement 27 August 2018    Dear ARTIS community  We are excited to announce that we are preparing to migrate from the existing wallet software to the new Artis Turba Exchange. This will start taking effect from the first week of September onwards and in light of this you will need to do either of the following with your existing wallets on the Artis Turba platform;  1)   If you want to keep your wallet addresses then you will need to make sure that you have those wallet‚Äôs private keys, if not, you will need to back it up. You can use that same private key and access your wallet and funds through any suitable wallet provider such as Eidoo, imToken, Metamask, etc.  2)   If you do not want to keep the wallet address and have assets in those wallets then you would need to send your assets to another address as soon as possible.  Let us know if you require any assistance. Artis Turba Team

Author: Lifestudent38
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: We are happy to announce that the Artis Turba Exchange is now LIVE.  South Africans can now buy and trade Cryptocurrencies such as ARTIS, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tron, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, Digibyte, Ripple in one of 4 markets; ZAR, BTC, ETH and XRP. Artis Turba accepts bank deposits of ZAR and are looking forward to accepting multiple fiats such as Naira, Singapore Dollar and Thai Baht to name just a few in the medium term outlook. We sincerely hope that this will open the way for South African participation in the new exciting technology of the blockchain and also to pave the way for cross border settlement in due time.  For the launch the AARP Pay Out has been BOOSTED for a limited time only by dividing the Pay Out by the actual ARTIS on the Exchange and not 350,000,000    Forward together

Author: Lifestudent38
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba Public Announcement 28 September 2018      Hello ARTIS community,  We are really excited about the launch of the Artis Turba Exchange and the implementation of the long awaited ARTIS Affiliate Reward Program (AARP) which entitle ARTIS holders to share in the fee revenue generated on the Artis Turba Exchange, this is a huge achievement for Artis Turba, our Team, our Investors and our Community. Taking into consideration the delays, we are exceptionally proud of the fact that we have now delivered on our milestone as per our Whitepaper.  According to recent independent studies only an average of 3% of ICO‚Äôs deliver on their promises. This calls for a BIG thank you to our Community for being believers and patiently supporting Artis Turba, we could not achieve this without you. We look forward to seeing our community continuously earning from the performance of the exchange.  As a promotion for a limited time only the amount of ARTIS circulating on Artis Turba Exchange and not the total supply are used to calculate AARP, at the time of writing the amount of ARTIS on the Exchange is equal to approximately 5 million, thus boosting the AARP Pay Out.  Thank you again to everyone who are here and happy trading.  Forward Together, Nigel & Nickey

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Why hold ARTIS?  The ARTIS Affiliate Reward Program or AARP will reward ARTIS holders by sharing revenue generated on the Artis Turba exchange pro rata to the ARTIS they hold  Recently, an ARTIS member asked how much earnings he could expect by holding 5,000 ARTIS. The following forecast was made and please note that earnings are dependent on trade volume.

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Why hold ARTIS?  The ARTIS Affiliate Reward Program or AARP will reward ARTIS holders by sharing revenue generated on the Artis Turba exchange pro rata to the ARTIS they hold  Recently, an ARTIS member asked how much earnings he could expect by holding 5,000 ARTIS. The following forecast was made and please note that earnings are dependent on trade volume.   Example   "For example if i will hold  5000 artis how much i will get artis or dollars?"  "it will depend on 2 factors; trade volume on ARTIS TURBA exchange (ex fees are 0.25% per trade) and the prices of all the cryptos listed. The payouts will be distributed in BTC, ETH, DASH, LTC, XRP, XMR, ARTIS according to each cryptos underlying volume traded.  So for simplicity let us assume that the sum of all cryptos volumes equals $10 million per day Ex fees = $10 million x 0.25% = $25,000 Share 50% = $12,500  $12,500 is then split among all ARTIS holders via smart contracts (the equivalent in BTC, DASH, XRP, XMR, LTC, ETH and ARTIS).  There is 350 million ARTIS so  1 ARTIS gets $12,500/350,000,000 ARTIS = $0.00003571 per day  Thus 5000 ARTIS gets $0.00003571 per day x 5000 ARTIS = $0.17 per day

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: ARTIS on BitUniverse  Download the BitUniverse App: Android App iOS App   The Bituniverse team has built an incredible app through which you can track your Cryptocurrency portfolio and it supports most of the Cryptocurrencies and Tokens available on the market. As such ARTIS is supported on the app and this is a quick guide to selecting the relevant ARTIS since there has been Artis Turba impersonators about‚Ä¶   Steps to adding ARTIS to your favorites  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*tVMSgoZWQQMq9ozT50gCrA.pnghttps://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*K8zyFaVMTX4-JFdlXtoliQ.pnghttps://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*NTt9XfWlLDfvYJ96ni8cBQ.png  Steps to adding ARTIS to your favorites  Step 1‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäNavigate to the Watchlist tab  Step 2‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäClick on ‚Äú+ ADD NEW COINS‚Äù in the ‚ÄúPicks‚Äù window  Step 3‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäSearch for ARTIS  Step 4‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäStar the relevant ARTIS pairs  Note which ARTIS pairs has been starred in the image above. These are the relevant ARTIS pairs.   Steps to tracking your ARTIS portfolio  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*kXmA4fFksUG524sbj_nYUA.pnghttps://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*THUHfyqYgGLbFsxDRcF3uQ.pnghttps://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*8K43rD0m3AWkUtlkJ8bMcg.png  Step 1‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäNavigate to the Portfolio Tracker Tab by clicking on ‚ÄúPortfolio‚Äù on the bottom left of the screen  Step 2‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäAfter clicking on ‚ÄúGet Started‚Äù, select ‚ÄúAuto import from wallet‚Äù  Step 3‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääinsert your public address where your ARTIS is stored. For those who are concerned about the safety of their wallets should note that this is only a balance query API system which means that the API only reads the balances of the Cryptocurrencies and Tokens of an address and can in no way interact with your wallet at all!  Step 4‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäWhen visiting your portfolio page it should look something like the image below. You can adjust settings in the ‚ÄúMe‚Äù tab to adjust the APP according to your personal preferences, such as currency, look and feel etc.   Forward Together!

Author: Lifestudent38
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Hi Glenn,  Nigel here from Artis Turba.  This is the reason to hold ARTIS As Sarabenda mentioned the AARP program will reward holders in BTC, ETH, EOS, XRP, DGB, LTC, Dash, and more as Crypto's are listed on the coming exchange. Basically how this works is that when these crypto's are traded in pairs, the seller pays a TX fee of 0.25% in the Crypto sold. These fee's will be distributed to ARTIS holders pro-rata to the amount of ARTIS they hold (note that only 50% of collected fees will be directed into operational costs of the exchange).  This sets the exchange apart Note that the exchange will be made live in June this year.  Cross Pairs availability - which means you will see unique trading pairs available for the first time e.g., ETH/XRP Multi Device Platform - now users can trade easily through desktop or mobile Simplified UI and user friendly design - in our market research we have learned that many people are still hesitant on entering the Cryptosphere due to lack of user ability. Really think about this; most people are not so technically savvy and do not understand all the technical ways of blockchain technology Free signals (I would rather call them trading recommendations) will be given to our users as part of our proprietary trading algorithm - this will give traders that extra hand when they need it most Uniquely positioned in Africa that will pave the way for fiat conversions on the continent. There are two competitors here called Luno and Altcoin Trader however the above will make us truly beyond borders  I hope this clears it for you

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba News Update 26 February 2018  Today the Artis Turba ICO has ended successfully, what an exciting journey! We will not change anything, especially to know all members have come together to build a community that have a common goal, we are proud and honoured to be part of such a great community.  We want to take this opportunity to give a BIG Thank You to the community, especially those who contributed in the ICO and those who were active on the social media to promote ARTIS, that is what a community do, it wouldn‚Äôt be possible without you.  Going forward we would first like to announce that the distribution of the ICO ARTIS will be completed in this week. It was also decided that there would be a reward for all members who contributed in the ICO byway of additional ARTIS, it is necessary to reward members who contributed in the ICO. Details to follow.  Secondly we are working hard to get the wallet released, this would place Artis Turba in a TOTALLY different league as we would compete with major players in the industry and would definitely affect the value of ARTIS. We obviously encountered delays due to hardware and network upgrades and expect the wallet release in the first or second week of March 2018.  Lastly we want to ensure we honour the trust that was vested in us by our members and ensure we create value for every ARTIS holder. Negotiating and selecting an exchange for ARTIS, especially the first one, are a very strategic decision and there are a lot of negotiating behind the scenes. We however reiterate that we are here to ensure we create value.  Thank you again, you guys are AWSOME! Forward together!  Nigel & Nickey

Forward Together!!  Nigel & Nickey

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Hi Alvena,  The signals will be generated from a proprietary algorithm and ultimately it will be the users discretion to follow the signal or not - as such this will not be an automated trading system but will rather point out trends to users so they can stay informed for any sensitive trend changes.  As for the proprietary system - it is based on Price Action Trading along with trend indicators that will alert users of trend changes.  The author (Nigel Peacock) has been trading forex with a similar system successfully and you can view some of his past trading decisions from tweets from his account on twitter at https://twitter.com/lifestudent38

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba News Update 14 March 2018  What an exciting journey! We hereby wish to update all of our members with regards to the progress of the project at this stage as we approach full wallet release which will launch the Artis Turba Project into a whole new league, as wallet functionality will ensure that we compete with major industry peers.  Considering that we are working towards our own exchange we faced some delays to ensure that the foundational architecture is in place for the upcoming exchange as we won‚Äôt stop development after the wallet release.  As we all know‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääsecurity is a major concern when it comes to Cryptocurrencies and hence the Development team is now hard at work to ensure that users can safely store their Cryptocurrencies in Artis Turba wallets. The wallets will make use of Salted Hashing techniques which means that users‚Äô information is and always remains encrypted. Furthermore, a 2 Factor-Authentication Pin by the user will be required to sign transactions, such as sending Cryptocurrencies or even trading them. This ultimately means that our users can safely store their Cryptocurrencies with ease of mind in Artis Turba wallets.  Once security is finalised it will be merged with the already wallet coding which leaves us with fully functional wallets for Artis, Ethereum and Bitcoin. Shortly thereafter the other major Cryptocurrencies n.l., Litecoin, Dash, and Ripple will be added to the list before we proceed with the development of the exchange.    The scheduled date of release for the wallets is on Monday the 19th of March, 2018. Happy Trading, and Forward Together!    Nigel & Nickey

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Affiliate Reward Program  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*-Z_yrtCCpe5oN6-TW7o_Rg.png  Artis Turba is excited to announce the ARTIS Affiliate Rewards Program (AARP). The AARP grants holders of ARTIS the right to share in the Artis Turba revenue stream generated by operating its trading platform. Each ARTIS holder will receive an even distribution of 50% of the revenue generated from the trading platform, allocated according to ARTIS holdings. Artis Turba hereby aims to create a sustainable revenue stream for ARTIS holders by way of the AARP and ensure growth in the value of ARTIS as trading increase.  Transaction costs are levied on each trade and in the respective currency of each pair, the transaction cost are split 50% to Artis Turba for operational cost and 50% to ARTIS holders as reward. The rewards due to ARTIS holders are credited to their Artis Turba wallets for each respective currency.  Forward together!

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: Artis Turba News Update 28 March 2018  Hey guys! We hope that you are all enjoying the journey with us and that all Artis Turba family members are as excited as we are about Artis Turba's first product release occurring today. Artis Turba development is conducted in phases and each phase represents a significant milestone to reach in order to provide a wholesome service and experience to our users.  Today's wallet release is termed phase 1.1 and includes full wallet functionality for Artis, Ethereum and Bitcoin. Our users will now be able to safely and securely store and transact with their Cryptocurrencies. Thereafter, Phase 1.2 is expected to be completed over the next month and will see wallet functionality implemented for Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Dash, Ripple, Monero and popular ERC-20'S.  We are happy that phase 2.1 work has already started and is expected to be completed in June month 2018, during which we will implement the Artis Turba exchange platform. The exchange platform will enable our users to trade the listed Cryptocurrencies and will open up new Crypto pairs which has not been available to the public as of yet! We are also aiming to create a new trend and standard for Crypto Exchanges in terms of user functionality.  Phase 2.2 is the highly anticipated Artis Turba Affiliate Rewards Program and will be implemented along with phase 2.1. This will enable all of our users to earn an income from Cryptocurrencies and we have worked hard to ensure that the model implemented will be sustainable in the long term.  After the first two phases we will move onto phase 3 which we termed the "value addition" phase. During this phase we will implement free signals for our users as well as fiat conversion options! We are also glad to announce that we have already started negotiating with service providers about this.  As for the listing of ARTIS on additional exchanges; we will apply to more exchanges after completion of phase 1 and are carefully considering the options to place ARTIS strategically.  Our recent listing on OctaEx has enabled ARTIS pairs with BTC, LTC and USD and also afforded ARTIS the opportunity to gain exposure to the Asian markets.  We sincerely believe that the completion of each phase will boost confidence in ARTIS and thereby promote growth for all ARTIS holders.  Forward Together!  Nigel & Nickey

The AARP grants holders of ARTIS the right to share in the Artis Turba revenue stream generated by operating its trading platform. Each ARTIS holder will receive an even distribution of 50% of the revenue generated from the trading platform, allocated according to ARTIS holdings. Artis Turba hereby aims to create a sustainable revenue stream for ARTIS holders by way of the AARP and ensure growth in the value of ARTIS as trading increase.  Transaction costs are levied on each trade and in the respective currency of each pair, the transaction cost are split 50% to Artis Turba for operational cost and 50% to ARTIS holders as reward. The rewards due to ARTIS holders are credited to their Artis Turba wallets for each respective currency.   Ultimately ARTIS will be used to settle trades between different currencies on the Artis Turba trading platform as transaction cost. Forward together!

Author: ArtisTurba
Title: Artis Turba - Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform
Body: https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*pSlOTTSFOJ4s5zvwTeNRJw.jpeg  Connect with us   Artis Turba Website | Whitepaper | Medium | Twitter | Facebook | Instagram | Reddit | Github | Telegram | ARTIS Blockexplorer | *ARTIS Portfolio Tracker on BitUniverse  As seen on https://i.imgflip.com/27t3wt.jpg click on image above to visit the page  Buy and Sell ARTIS on the following Exchanges ForkDelta ARTIS/ETH | EtherDelta ARTIS/ETH | OctaEx ARTIS/BTC | OctaEx ARTIS/LTC | OctaEx ARTIS/USD  OctaEx Pro-Trade Platforms OctaEx ARTIS/BTC Pro-Trade | OctaEx ARTIS/LTC Pro-Trade | OctaEx ARTIS/USD Pro-Trade  Artis Turba Vision    To provide a Multi Device Cryptocurrency Wallet & Trading Platform along with buy, sell and hold signals for the major Cryptocurrencies.  Introducing Artis Turba  Artis Turba derived from Latin meaning skilled crowd is a cryptocurrency wallet and trading platform for the blockchain era that simplifies asset management and trading of all the leading cryptocurrencies and allow everyone with a smartphone to send, receive and trade on a clean and intuitive and thus user friendly interface. The user interface layers over the technical data and analysis to continuously generate buy, sell and hold signals, allowing anyone without the technical knowledge to successfully trade cryptocurrencies by leveraging the technical backend.     ARTIS  ARTIS is built on the Ethereum ERC20 standard, and can be freely stored in any secure wallet which you control your own private keys such as MyEtherWallet, Mist, imToken, Eidoo, Metamask, Ledger Nano S or Trezor.  To add ARTIS as a Custom Token; Token Contract Address = 0x082e13494f12ebb7206fbf67e22a6e1975a1a669 Token Symbol = ARTIS Decimals = 8 350 Million ARTIS was created as a limited supply token and no more will ever be created!!  Why hold ARTIS?  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*-Z_yrtCCpe5oN6-TW7o_Rg.png  The ARTIS Affiliate Reward Program or AARP will reward ARTIS holders by sharing revenue generated on the Artis Turba exchange pro rata to the ARTIS they hold  Artis Turba Medium - Artis Affiliate Reward Program  **Check out the bottom of this post for an example of how AARP will be calculated.  Artis Turba Wallet  List of Supported Cryptocurrencies 31 March 2018  ARTIS Ethereum Bitcoin  List of Planned Cryptocurrencies to be rolled out during phase 1.2 release  Bitcoin Cash Litecoin Dash Ripple Monero EOS Tron OmiseGo  Artis Turba News Update 28 March 2018  Hey guys! We hope that you are all enjoying the journey with us and that all Artis Turba family members are as excited as we are about Artis Turba's first product release occurring today. Artis Turba development is conducted in phases and each phase represents a significant milestone to reach in order to provide a wholesome service and experience to our users.  Today's wallet release is termed phase 1.1 and includes full wallet functionality for Artis, Ethereum and Bitcoin. Our users will now be able to safely and securely store and transact with their Cryptocurrencies. Thereafter, Phase 1.2 is expected to be completed over the next month and will see wallet functionality implemented for Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Dash, Ripple, Monero and popular ERC-20'S.  We are happy that phase 2.1 work has already started and is expected to be completed in June month 2018, during which we will implement the Artis Turba exchange platform. The exchange platform will enable our users to trade the listed Cryptocurrencies and will open up new Crypto pairs which has not been available to the public as of yet! We are also aiming to create a new trend and standard for Crypto Exchanges in terms of user functionality.  Phase 2.2 is the highly anticipated Artis Turba Affiliate Rewards Program and will be implemented along with phase 2.1. This will enable all of our users to earn an income from Cryptocurrencies and we have worked hard to ensure that the model implemented will be sustainable in the long term.  After the first two phases we will move onto phase 3 which we termed the "value addition" phase. During this phase we will implement free signals for our users as well as fiat conversion options! We are also glad to announce that we have already started negotiating with service providers about this.  As for the listing of ARTIS on additional exchanges; we will apply to more exchanges after completion of phase 1 and are carefully considering the options to place ARTIS strategically.  Our recent listing on OctaEx has enabled ARTIS pairs with BTC, LTC and USD and also afforded ARTIS the opportunity to gain exposure to the Asian markets.  We sincerely believe that the completion of each phase will boost confidence in ARTIS and thereby promote growth for all ARTIS holders.  Forward Together!  Artis Turba Roadmap  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/800/1*D6E2_A7Bg2BLBBUP-4n51w.png  *ARTIS Portfolio Tracker  Our preferred APP for the tracking of ARTIS portfolio is the BitUniverse App. Checkout the following post for more details about loading ARTIS into your APP. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2539340.msg33748932#msg33748932  **AARP Calculation Example  Recently, an ARTIS member asked how much earnings he could expect from the AARP program by holding 5,000 ARTIS. The following forecast was made and please note that calculations here are based on the assumption that trading volumes are $10 million per day constantly and that earnings are dependent on trade volume.    "For example if i will hold  5000 artis how much i will get artis or dollars?"  It will depend on 2 factors; trade volume on ARTIS TURBA exchange (ex fees are 0.25% per trade) and the prices of all the cryptos listed. The payouts will be distributed in the underlying Cryptocurrencies n.l., BTC, ETH, DASH, LTC, XRP, XMR, ARTIS (more will be added to this list in due time) according to each cryptos underlying volume traded.  So for simplicity let us assume that the sum of all cryptos volumes equals $10 million per day Ex fees = $10 million x 0.25% = $25,000 Share 50% = $12,500  $12,500 is then split among all ARTIS holders via smart contracts (the equivalent in BTC, DASH, XRP, XMR, LTC, ETH and ARTIS).  There is 350 million ARTIS so  1 ARTIS gets $12,500/350,000,000 ARTIS = $0.00003571 per day  Thus 5000 ARTIS gets $0.00003571 per day x 5000 ARTIS = $0.17 per day
